TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AjaxFrameworkMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies how client scripts of the Microsoft Ajax client library are included on the client.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode Disabled = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Specifies that all [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] script features are disabled and that the control does not reference any scripts automatically.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode Enabled = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Specifies that the control automatically includes the MicrosoftAjax.js script file, which is a combined script file of every core framework script (legacy behavior).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.AjaxFrameworkMode Explicit = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Specifies that you will explicitly include script references to individual framework core script file that your page requires, and that you will include references to the dependencies that each script file requires.
